column4: if i install Ubuntu 10.04.1 (wubi), can i easily update it to 10.10, through the OS it's self?
I just need a simple yes or no, before i go and decicde to install Ubuntu... Does no one know?
I tried that... but ran into issues of it not detecting my HDD (doesnt pass the space requirements)
not designed for long term use or upgrading, be careful, have whatever is there backed up.
